summary: Contains bells for ears, an nose ring and an nose ring with a chain to an earring.
descriptionHtml:
Second version of piercing pack.

Contains bells for ears, an nose ring and an nose ring with a chain to an earring.
Updated so it\'s less plastic looking.
Male and female
Spesial mesh for Khajiits for all three.


Tested for Khajiit and humans, the nose ring might crash with some noses. 
Send me screenshots an I see if I need to treat other races spesial or create multiple versions for nose placements.

Bells uses ear slot(43) nose ring and ring+chain uses slot (44)
All can be enchanted as rings.
--

Changes from version1, the plain nose ring, male suport, better less plastic materials
Changed equipment slot for nose from 46 to 44 as 44 is face standard.
author: Zaria
